description: As a freelancer on Fiverr, I specialize in front-end web development using React and Tailwind CSS. I have completed projects involving HTML template design, WordPress sites, and converting designs into responsive, functional websites.

At Inspired It, I work on management software like Office and School Management Systems. My role includes creating user-friendly interfaces and collaborating with backend developers to ensure smooth and efficient system functionality.

company: Tech I Trick Web Development Team
description: As co-founder of Tech I Trick, I helped lead a team focused on developing modern web solutions. I was responsible for overseeing project development, ensuring high-quality output, and working with team members to build responsive and user-friendly web applications.
